text: Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn Benaian akam ikaragha ghaze, “A dera, nɨ an nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨva a mɨsueghtɨ, an aremegh. Egh an kuam inigh mangɨ anefagh. Joap gumazir osɨmtɨziba puvatɨziba pura me mɨsoagharɨghizɨ me ariaghire. Ezɨ an osɨmtɨzir kam, na ko nan afeziamɨn adarazir iti. Nɨ a mɨsueghtɨ, an aremeghtɨ, an osɨmtɨzir kam uam en ikian kogham.
